alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 12:51AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marin, southeastern Sonoma and south central Napa Counties through 115 AM PST... At 1250 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from San Geronimo to 32 miles west of El Granada. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Rafael, Novato, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Fairfax, San Geronimo, Kentfield, Lucas Valley-Marinwood, Black Point-Green Point, Stinson Beach, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley, Ross, Santa Venetia, Woodacre, Lagunitas-Forest Knolls and Bolinas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
